cast.overview: The Muppets gather to watch their newly-finished big-budget rich-and-famous feature film: a talent agent persuades Kermit the Frog to leave the swamp to pursue a career in Hollywood. On his way there, he meets a bear, a pig, a whatever (his future muppet crew), and some special celebrity guest stars, while being chased by the desperate owner of a frog-leg restaurant!
cast.title: The Muppet Movie

details.biography:
James Joseph Frawley (September 29, 1936 – January 22, 2019) was an American director and actor.

Description above from the Wikipedia article James Frawley, licensed under CC-BY-SA, full list of contributors on Wikipedia.
details.name: James Frawley
